methods.name: Thermocompression
cons: High heat (>300째C) damages modern sensitive dies

methods.name: Ultrasonic
pros: No heat means no oxidation issues
No thermal damage to sensitive components

methods.name: Thermosonic
pros: Works with multiple wire types (Au, Cu, Ag)
Good balance of speed and quality
Moderate heat softens wire while ultrasonics scrub oxide and weld
cons: Requires both heating and ultrasonic equipment

standard.description: Standard frequency for general bonding applications

highFrequency.description: High Frequency bonding allows for bonding at lower temperatures (down to 100째C) and faster times. The higher frequency creates more efficient scrubbing friction at the interface, allowing metal-to-metal contact without aggressive heating.
